underlying_goal: Debug why Twitter posting fails due to authentication/token refresh issues despite having implemented automatic re-authentication
friction_detail: Claude initially confirmed the feature was implemented but it still failed in practice, leading to extensive debugging that ultimately pointed to an external platform limitation rather than a code fix.
brief_summary: User wanted to know why Twitter posting still fails despite auto-reauthentication being implemented; Claude investigated thoroughly but couldn't resolve it, suspecting a Twitter API tier limitation.
